item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. macOS menu bar app that shows how full the ISS urine tank is in real time (573 points | 137 comments)
2. T * sin (t)' ≈ Ornamented Christmas Tree (2013) (131 points | 9 comments)
3. Show HN: FixBrowser – a lightweight web browser created from scratch (40 points | 11 comments)

7. Exploring LoRA – Part 1: The Idea Behind Parameter Efficient Fine-Tuning (42 points | 2 comments)
8. A Taping of 'Curb Your Enthusiasm' Saved an Innocent Man from Death Row (2017) (29 points | 18 comments)
9. Masks, Smoke, and Mirrors: The story of EgyptAir flight 804 (138 points | 61 comments)
10. A pilot raced through the airport to surprise the woman who saved his life (23 points | discuss)
11. Will that hub or dock slow your SSDs, or even make them faster? (50 points | 28 comments)
12. Adversarial policies beat superhuman Go AIs (2023) (263 points | 110 comments)
13. Shockley Semiconductor Laboratory (72 points | 26 comments)
14. The number pi has an evil twin (474 points | 187 comments)

16. Are Immutable Linux Distros right for you? (25 points | 13 comments)
17. What happened to the world's largest tube TV? [video] (629 points | 274 comments)
18. Gordon Mah Ung has died (93 points | 14 comments)
19. Hoarder: Self-hostable bookmark-everything app (301 points | 58 comments)
20. Jujutsu Megamerges and jj Absorb (26 points | 7 comments)
21. What would it take to add refinement types to Rust? (97 points | 54 comments)
22. A Practitioner's Guide to Wide Events (50 points | 24 comments)
23. Voices from the Dead Letter Office (5 points | discuss)
24. Minutes of a Meeting Held at Gear Ratio on Tuesday 13 June 78 [pdf] (20 points | 7 comments)
25. On the nature of computing science (1984) (220 points | 87 comments)
26. Cerebrum: Simulate and infer synaptic connectivity in large-scale brain networks (87 points | 66 comments)
27. Making AMD GPUs competitive for LLM inference (2023) (279 points | 180 comments)
28. ScyllaDB no longer open source (14 points | 5 comments)
29. Build a Low-Cost Drone Using ESP32 (371 points | 126 comments)
30. Why are cancer guidelines stuck in PDFs? (270 points | 132 comments)
